Module org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker
Package org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.data

Class QuizRegister

java.lang.Object
org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.data.QuizRegister
public class QuizRegister extends Object
A class used to interact with the storage system of quizzes

    • QuizRegister

      public QuizRegister()

  • Method Details

    • getQuizList

      public static ArrayList<QuizModel> getQuizList()
      Returns:
      A complete representation of the database represented by an arraylist of quizzes

    • isReadOnly

      public static boolean isReadOnly()
      Tests if the database is read only.
      Returns:
      true if read only and false if writable

    • getActiveQuizzes

      public static ArrayList<QuizModel> getActiveQuizzes()
      Gets all quizzes where the isActive flag is set to true.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all active quizzes.

    • getArchivedQuizzes

      public static ArrayList<QuizModel> getArchivedQuizzes()
      Gets all quizzes where the isActive flag is set to false.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of al inactive/archived quizzes.

    • getQuiz

      public static QuizModel getQuiz(int id)
      Gets a quiz with a specific id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the quiz.
      Returns:
      A quiz object representation of the entry in the database. null is returned if no quiz matching the query is found in the database.

    • getTeam

      public static TeamModel getTeam(int id)
      Gets a team with a specific id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the team.
      Returns:
      A team object representation of the entry in the database. null is returned if no team matching the query is found in the database.

    • getQuestion

      public static QuestionModel getQuestion(int id)
      Gets a question with a specific id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the question.
      Returns:
      A question object representation of the entry in the database. null is returned if no question matching the query is found in the database.

    • saveQuiz

      public static QuizModel saveQuiz(QuizModel quiz) throws IOException
      Saves a quiz and ALL its content to the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz to save to the database.
      Returns:
      A quiz object representation of the entry in the database AFTER it has been updated. null is returned if something went wrong when the quiz was saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if something went wrong during the creation of the answer sheet.

    • saveTeam

      public static TeamModel saveTeam(TeamModel team)
      Saves a team to the database. To use this method, the team object should already be an entry in the database. If it is not, one should instead use the method newTeam to create a new team with a relation to a quiz.
      Parameters:
      team - The team to save to the database.
      Returns:
      A team object representation of the entry in the database AFTER it has been updated. null is returned if something went wrong when the team was saved.

    • saveQuestion

      public static QuestionModel saveQuestion(QuestionModel question)
      Saves a question to the database. To use this method, the question object should already be an entry in the database. If it is not, one should instead use the method newQuestion to create a new question with a relation to a quiz.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to save to the database.
      Returns:
      A question object representation of the entry in the database AFTER it has been updated. null is returned if something went wrong when the question was saved.

    • newQuiz

      public static QuizModel newQuiz() throws IOException
      Create a new quiz.
      Returns:
      The new quiz.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if something wrong happened when creating a result-sheet.

    • newTeam

      public static TeamModel newTeam(QuizModel quiz)
      Creates a new team entry in the database and ads an object representation to the supplied quiz. This method must be called when creating a new teams.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz the team should be part of.
      Returns:
      A team object representation of the entry in the database AFTER it has been added to the database. null is returned if something went wrong when the team was added to the database.

    • newQuestion

      public static QuestionModel newQuestion(QuizModel quiz)
      Creates a new question entry in the database and ads an object representation to the supplied quiz. This method must be called when creating a new questions.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz the question should be part of.
      Returns:
      A question object representation of the entry in the database AFTER it has been added to the database. null is returned if something went wrong when the question was added to the database.

    • removeQuiz

      public static boolean removeQuiz(QuizModel quiz)
      Removes a quiz and all its contents (questions and teams) from the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz to remove from the database.
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false if not.

    • removeTeam

      public static boolean removeTeam(QuizModel quiz, int teamId)
      Removes a team from the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz the team is a component of.
      teamId - The id of the team to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false if not.

    • removeQuestion

      public static boolean removeQuestion(QuizModel quiz, int questionId)
      Removes a team from the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz the team is a component of.
      questionId - The id of the team to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false if not.

    • populateDatabase

      public static ArrayList<QuizModel> populateDatabase(int quizzes, int teams, int questions) throws IOException
      Populates the database with a set number of quizzes and a set number of teams and question per quiz.
      Parameters:
      quizzes - The number of quizzes to fill that database with.
      teams - The number of teams to fill each quiz with.
      questions - The number of questions to fill each quiz with.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the quizzes that were added to the database.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if something wrong happened when creating the result sheet.
